scenes.description: MC section after the song, thanking guests and chatting.

subtitles.original: ...思うのぜいたくなのかななのかな
subtitles.english: ...Is it too selfish to think that way?

subtitles.original: 感情的な太陽は
subtitles.english: The emotional sun

subtitles.original: 熱を上げすぎてどうにかなりそう
subtitles.english: Raises its heat so much that I'm about to lose it

subtitles.original: 叫びたくてしょうがない
subtitles.english: I want to scream so badly

subtitles.original: がむしゃらに求めてるアイデンティティ
subtitles.english: My identity that I'm frantically searching for

subtitles.original: Inside my feeling...
subtitles.english: Inside my feeling...

subtitles.original: Inside my justice... 邪魔しないで 居場所はどこ?
subtitles.english: Inside my justice... Don't get in my way, where do I belong?

subtitles.original: 「変わったね」誰かが言ってお隣でこだまして
subtitles.english: "You've changed," someone says, echoing next to me

subtitles.original: ぱたんなに張ってんだか壁 捏ねて起きて今日も最低点
subtitles.english: Against what am I putting up a wall? Waking up and starting another awful day

subtitles.original: 飾ったってこの表情が苦手な僕がいるよ
subtitles.english: There's a version of me that's bad at this decorated expression

subtitles.original: 僕にしかできないことがるってのもしってんだけど
subtitles.english: I know there's something only I can do

subtitles.original: tell me 誰だってどうにかが心配なの
subtitles.english: Tell me, everyone's worried about something

subtitles.original: 頷く言葉 ただ一つ
subtitles.english: There's only one word to agree on

subtitles.original: 本当はどうなのが気になるよ
subtitles.english: I'm curious what the truth really is

subtitles.original: 答えを探すの 見つけたい 見つめたい
subtitles.english: Searching for an answer, I want to find it, I want to gaze at it

subtitles.original: 孤独を知って愛を知る
subtitles.english: Learning of loneliness and learning of love

subtitles.original: 割り切れるほど大人じゃないんだが
subtitles.english: I'm not mature enough to just let it go

subtitles.original: 寂しいけれど譲れない
subtitles.english: It's lonely, but I won't back down

subtitles.original: 僕だけのブレないアイデンティティ
subtitles.english: My very own unwavering identity

subtitles.original: 行くのこれだけじゃダメさ
subtitles.english: Just going like this isn't enough

subtitles.original: 何かを感じたいからここにいるわけさ
subtitles.english: The reason I'm here is because I want to feel something

subtitles.original: 誰かにもらった快楽が
subtitles.english: Pleasure given to me by someone else

subtitles.original: 僕の幸せとは限らないぜ
subtitles.english: Doesn't necessarily mean it's my happiness

subtitles.original: 名も無い毎日だけど
subtitles.english: Even though my days are nameless

subtitles.original: 意味を確立できる日は来るよ
subtitles.english: The day I can establish meaning will come

subtitles.original: 中二病と呼ばれても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm called a "Chuunibyou"

subtitles.original: モラトリアムの渦の中
subtitles.english: Inside the whirlpool of moratorium

subtitles.original: 感情的な太陽は
subtitles.english: The emotional sun

subtitles.original: 熱を上げすぎてどうにかなりそう
subtitles.english: Raises its heat so much that I'm about to lose it

subtitles.original: 叫びたくてしょうがない
subtitles.english: I want to scream so badly

subtitles.original: がむしゃらに求めてるアイデンティティ
subtitles.english: My identity that I'm frantically searching for

subtitles.original: Inside my feeling...
subtitles.english: Inside my feeling...

subtitles.original: Inside my justice... 邪魔しないで 居場所はどこ?
subtitles.english: Inside my justice... Don't get in my way, where do I belong?

subtitles.original: Happy 3D Showcase Biboo!
subtitles.english: Happy 3D Showcase Biboo!

subtitles.original: Yeah, that was so much fun! We did it!
subtitles.english: Yeah, that was so much fun! We did it!

subtitles.original: Oh my gosh, congratulations!
subtitles.english: Oh my gosh, congratulations!

subtitles.original: Calli! Towa! Congrats!
subtitles.english: Calli! Towa! Congrats!

subtitles.original: Happy 3D!
subtitles.english: Happy 3D!

subtitles.original: Thanks for inviting us!
subtitles.english: Thanks for inviting us!

subtitles.original:
Of course! Now that you're here,
is there any poses you want me to do?
subtitles.english:
Of course! Now that you're here,
is there any poses you want me to do?

subtitles.original: Do the worm!
subtitles.english: Do the worm!

subtitles.original: The worm? Oh, okay!
subtitles.english: The worm? Oh, okay!

subtitles.original: Go, go, go, go! Woo!
subtitles.english: Go, go, go, go! Woo!

subtitles.original: How was that? Was that good?
subtitles.english: How was that? Was that good?

subtitles.original: Wonderful.
subtitles.english: Wonderful.

subtitles.original: Yes! So much fun! Congrats!
subtitles.english: Yes! So much fun! Congrats!

subtitles.original: Thank you for inviting us!
subtitles.english: Thank you for inviting us!

subtitles.original: Yeah! How do you feel, Towa-sama?
subtitles.english: Yeah! How do you feel, Towa-sama?

subtitles.original: I feel very good!
subtitles.english: I feel very good!

subtitles.original: You feel good? I'm so happy!
subtitles.english: You feel good? I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: I chose this song because,
subtitles.english: I chose this song because,

subtitles.original: you know, we're all very 'chuuni', right?
subtitles.english: you know, we're all very 'chuuni', right?

subtitles.original: Chuuni? Senpai chuuni Biboo?
subtitles.english: Chuuni? Senpai chuuni Biboo?

subtitles.original: Is Towa-senpai chuuni too?
subtitles.english: Is Towa-senpai chuuni too?

subtitles.original:
No, I chose Towa-sama because
I wanted to sing with Towa-sama!
subtitles.english:
No, I chose Towa-sama because
I wanted to sing with Towa-sama!

subtitles.original: Aww, so cute! I wanted to sing with you too!
subtitles.english: Aww, so cute! I wanted to sing with you too!

subtitles.original: Arigatou gozaimasu!
subtitles.english: Arigatou gozaimasu!

subtitles.original: Yoshi yoshi! Cute!
subtitles.english: Yoshi yoshi! Cute!

subtitles.original: Hehehe, E-N-E?
subtitles.english: Hehehe, E-N-E?

subtitles.original: E-N-E! E-N-E!
subtitles.english: E-N-E! E-N-E!

subtitles.original: ENE generation! Yay!
subtitles.english: ENE generation! Yay!

subtitles.original: Yay! E-N-E!
subtitles.english: Yay! E-N-E!

subtitles.original: Thank you guys so much
subtitles.english: Thank you guys so much

subtitles.original: for being a part of my 3D! I'm so honored!
subtitles.english: for being a part of my 3D! I'm so honored!

subtitles.original: No problem! But next time,
subtitles.english: No problem! But next time,

subtitles.original: I'm gonna beat you in Pebblemon! Watch out!
subtitles.english: I'm gonna beat you in Pebblemon! Watch out!

subtitles.original:
Yeah, you better watch out for us three!
Pay your senpai tax!
subtitles.english:
Yeah, you better watch out for us three!
Pay your senpai tax!

subtitles.original: I'll fight back!
subtitles.english: I'll fight back!

subtitles.original: I'm not going down without a fight!
subtitles.english: I'm not going down without a fight!

subtitles.original: That's the spirit! Good luck!
subtitles.english: That's the spirit! Good luck!

subtitles.original: We wish you luck for the rest of your 3D! Bye-bye!
subtitles.english: We wish you luck for the rest of your 3D! Bye-bye!
